examples: Good wine can make a meal.
95 per cent of the UK can now get superfast broadband.
Exercise can make a big difference to your state of health.
Can the ropes take the strain?
Daytime temperatures can reach 40°C.
words.defineEn: to be able to
words.defineVi: để có thể

examples: The delicate aroma of ripe may apples fills the kitchen.
The votes in the swing state may turn the tide in this election.
Finally the couple may be celebrating a birthday, a wedding anniversary or some other red-letter day.
A change of government may be on hand.
May I choose the restaurant?
words.defineEn: used to show the possibility of something happening or being the case
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để hiển thị khả năng của một cái gì đó xảy ra hoặc là trường hợp

examples: All men must die.
The show must go on!
You must have that angle off down pat.
The sign must be taken down.
You must have a cast-iron stomach.
words.defineEn: used to show that something is very important and needs to happen
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để cho thấy rằng một cái gì đó là rất quan trọng và cần phải xảy ra

examples: Maybe this photograph will jog your memory.
His new world record will take some beating.
The center will serve the whole community.
The judge will have the last word on the divorce agreement.
A white blouse will show the blood.
words.defineEn: expressing the future tense
words.defineVi: diễn đạt thì tương lai

examples: Two could play at that game, smart guy.
Doctors couldn't stop the bleeding.
That kick of yours could have easily made mincemeat of my face.
The guy couldn't even harm a flea.
I could murder a cup of tea!
words.defineEn: used to ask if one can do something
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để hỏi nếu một người có thể làm một cái gì đó

examples: I might be getting the flu.
"Yeah, and pigs might fly."
Yeah, and pigs might fly.
You might as well bring sand to the beach!
You might as well just quit.
words.defineEn: used to express a possibility
words.defineVi: dùng để diễn đạt một khả năng

examples: The sauce would kill the taste of the herbs.
This room would make a nice office.
A cure for lung cancer would save thousands of lives each year.
The book dealer would not break up the set.
Would wonders ever cease?
words.defineEn: used as the past form of will when reporting what someone has said or thought
words.defineVi: được sử dụng như hình thức quá khứ của ý chí khi báo cáo những gì ai đó đã nói hoặc nghĩ

examples: A couple of years in the army should make a man of him.
Offenders should receive their just deserts.
Teachers should read more poetry to children.
Should've bought that shirt.
Her death should serve as a warning to other young people.
words.defineEn: used to say what is suitable, right, etc., particularly when one is disapproving of something
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để nói những gì phù hợp, đúng, v.v., đặc biệt khi một người không tán thành điều gì đó

words.defineEn: used to say that something happened frequently or constantly in the past but not anymore
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để nói rằng một cái gì đó đã xảy ra thường xuyên hoặc liên tục trong quá khứ nhưng không còn nữa

examples: A fire attack shall chill the enemy to the bone.
Shall I take my host family a gift?
Shall I begin?
Shall I add your name to the list?
Shall we make a pit stop at the next service station?
words.defineEn: used to ask advice, questions, or making suggestions using the pronoun I or we
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để đưa ra lời khuyên, câu hỏi hoặc đưa ra đề xuất bằng cách sử dụng đại từ tôi hoặc chúng tôi

examples: Lower energy consumption means less pollution.
Her children mean the world to her.
Your friendship means a great deal to me.
They mean no harm.
They mean no harm.
words.defineEn: to have a particular meaning or represent something
words.defineVi: để có một ý nghĩa cụ thể hoặc đại diện cho một cái gì đó

examples: Check the remix.
The active ingredient checks the growth of bacteria.
Check the box next to the right answer.
I’ll check the dates.
Any baggage over five kilos must be checked.
words.defineEn: to make sure that a thing is true, correct, present, or in a good condition by examining something
words.defineVi: để đảm bảo rằng một điều là đúng, chính xác, hiện tại hoặc trong tình trạng tốt bằng cách kiểm tra một cái gì đó

examples: The truck carried a load of construction materials to the building site.
The judge's ruling carries significant weight in the legal community.
She carries the heavy grocery bags with one arm.
He carries a gym bag with his workout clothes and water bottle.
She carried a heavy load of books in her backpack.
words.defineEn: to hold someone or something and take them from one place to another
words.defineVi: để giữ một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó và đưa họ từ nơi này sang nơi khác

examples: The soldiers kept the attackers at bay.
Her father kept a grocer's shop.
The big fellow keeps a fish shop near the post office.
The master kept a weekly journal.
Always keep a backup of the file.
words.defineEn: to have or continue to have something
words.defineVi: để có hoặc tiếp tục có một cái gì đó

examples: Your car is waiting, sir.
C'm on the crowd is waiting.
We waited there for the better part of an hour.
What are you waiting for?
Leeds United had waited for success for eighteen years.
words.defineEn: to not leave until a person or thing is ready or present or something happens
words.defineVi: để không rời đi cho đến khi một người hoặc điều đã sẵn sàng hoặc hiện tại hoặc một cái gì đó xảy ra

examples: My father compares prices at different supermarkets to get the best deals.
In one way or another, the representatives will be compared with the total client system.
Limes have a tangier taste compared to lemons.
Being the Benjamin of the family, Sarah is constantly compared to her older siblings and their achievements.
Tortelloni's substantial size makes them a better choice compared to the bite-sized tortellini.
words.defineEn: to examine or look for the differences between of two or more objects
words.defineVi: để kiểm tra hoặc tìm kiếm sự khác biệt giữa hai hoặc nhiều đối tượng

examples: The performance improved as their confidence grew.
The economy is improving, but the other side of the coin is that inflation is becoming a bigger problem.
Swimming helps to improve our cardiovascular fitness.
The engineer designs cars and improves their performance.
She practices the piano every day to improve her skills.
words.defineEn: to make a person or thing better
words.defineVi: để làm cho một người hoặc điều tốt hơn

examples: I tried a new coffee blend with hints of chocolate and caramel.
Try some dried apricots as a healthy snack.
Give sweetsop a try!
Have you tried this new coffee?
The case was tried before a jury.
words.defineEn: to make an effort or attempt to do or have something
words.defineVi: để thực hiện một nỗ lực hoặc cố gắng để làm hoặc có một cái gì đó

examples: My friend prefers a vegetarian sandwich with avocado and sprouts.
She prefers the freedom and agility of a motorcycle over a car.
She prefers boneless turkey breast for its ease of slicing.
She preferred the bony cut of beef short ribs.
She prefers her coffee black, without any sugar or cream.
words.defineEn: to want or choose one person or thing instead of another because of liking them more
words.defineVi: muốn hoặc chọn một người hoặc một vật thay vì một người khác vì thích họ hơn

examples: She keeps repeating the same question.
They made me repeat the whole story.
The agent counsels them obliquely against waste, repeats the letter of the law, and smiles.
He'd walk around the house repeating his favourite sayings like a broken record.
I don’t want anything repeated outside these four walls.
words.defineEn: to complete an action more than one time
words.defineVi: để hoàn thành một hành động nhiều hơn một lần

examples: Her second movie followed close on the heels of her successful film debut.
Her second movie followed close on the heels of her successful film debut.
The movie follows the book faithfully.
The film faithfully follows Shakespeare's plot.
Millions of people followed the trial on TV.
words.defineEn: to go or come after someone or something; to move or travel behind someone or something
words.defineVi: đi hoặc đến sau ai đó hoặc cái gì đó; để di chuyển hoặc đi phía sau một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó

examples: A ramp allows easy access for wheelchairs.
The judge allowed my claim.
Our policy only allows for exchanges.
I allow myself a treat now and then.
The prisoners are allowed out of their cells for two hours a day.
words.defineEn: to let someone or something do a particular thing
words.defineVi: để cho ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó làm một điều cụ thể

examples: The concert tickets were selling out quickly, so I hurried to book mine online.
I'm not in a hurry to invest in that new company yet.
Ayyub hurried away to the women's side of the house.
'Hurry!'
She hurries back to the house.
words.defineEn: to move or do something very quickly, particularly because of a lack of time
words.defineVi: để di chuyển hoặc làm một cái gì đó rất nhanh chóng, đặc biệt là vì thiếu thời gian

examples: She counted zero stars in the sky.
I can count up to fifty in English.
Hold this position for a count of 10.
Aren’t you counting your chickens before they have hatched?
She never counted her chickens before they hatched
words.defineEn: to determine the number of people or objects in a group
words.defineVi: để xác định số lượng người hoặc đối tượng trong một nhóm

examples: That experience changed my life.
The storekeeper changed my dollar bill for four quarters.
Leaves change colour in autumn.
The wind has changed direction.
The lights changed to green.
words.defineEn: to make a person or thing different
words.defineVi: để làm cho một người hoặc điều khác nhau

examples: The construction project was completed without a hitch, thanks to the hard work of our team and the diligence of our contractors.
Thanksgiving is never complete without the aroma of a succulent turkey.
Tacos aren't complete without a generous amount of grated cheese on top.
They made complete pigs of themselves at the dinner.
Please return the completed form at your earliest convenience.
words.defineEn: to bring something to an end by making it whole
words.defineVi: để mang lại một cái gì đó để kết thúc bằng cách làm cho nó toàn bộ

examples: I picked a bouquet of fresh flowers from the field.
He often picks a quarrel.
Take your pick.
She sometimes picked fights with other girls at school.
I picked a handful of delicious sand cherries from the bush in my backyard.
words.defineEn: to choose someone or something out of a group of people or things
words.defineVi: để chọn một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó trong số một nhóm người hoặc vật

examples: At last the wind dropped.
Her eyes dropped to her lap.
I dropped another plate!
His voice dropped to a whisper.
The spoon dropped with a clatter from her hand.
words.defineEn: to let or make something fall to the ground
words.defineVi: để cho hoặc làm cho một cái gì đó rơi xuống đất

examples: the company's new policy purports to reduce its carbon footprint.
You can reduce the bitterness of sour gourd by soaking it in saltwater before cooking.
The heavy rain created a thick curtain of water, reducing visibility on the road.
The government took action to reduce unemployment rates.
We will have to adjust to our reduced circumstances.
words.defineEn: to make something less or smaller in amount, degree, price, etc.
words.defineVi: để làm cho một cái gì đó ít hơn hoặc nhỏ hơn về số lượng, mức độ, giá cả, vv

examples: The party continued into the wee small hours.
The road continues through the village of Knightwick.
The road continues for three miles.
They had to continue their journey on foot.
He continued his work in secret.
words.defineEn: to keep being, happening, or doing something
words.defineVi: để tiếp tục được, xảy ra, hoặc làm một cái gì đó

examples: The store stays open late on Thursdays.
The TV stays on all day in their house.
Stay in touch with your customers via Internet.
Stay in touch with the latest technologies.
Enjoy your stay at our hotel.
words.defineEn: to not move or leave
words.defineVi: không di chuyển hoặc rời đi

examples: The compass needle always points north.
The problem has now reached crisis point.
I take your point.
No point in spoiling the ship for a ha'porth of tar
The line cuts the circle at two points.
words.defineEn: to show the place or direction of someone or something by holding out a finger or an object
words.defineVi: để hiển thị địa điểm hoặc hướng của một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó bằng cách đưa ra một ngón tay hoặc một đối tượng

examples: The principal entered the hornet's nest of angry parents.
Enter these amounts on the credit side.
He entered the key into the lock and opened the door.
The party came to life when the host and hostess entered the room.
Mice can squeeze through small openings to enter a house.
words.defineEn: to come or go into a place
words.defineVi: đến hoặc đi vào một nơi

examples: They refused to present arms before the flag.
The officer refused to let his men take part in the operation.
The President refused to speak to reporters.
They refused to let us cross the border.
Mike refuses, takes the rap, and Ernie goes free.
words.defineEn: to not accept what someone has offered us or asked us to do
words.defineVi: không chấp nhận những gì ai đó đã cung cấp cho chúng tôi hoặc yêu cầu chúng tôi làm

examples: to return a greeting.
Please return the completed form at your earliest convenience.
I am returned.
He did not return her love.
The stock market rally resulted in a fat return on investment for many investors.
words.defineEn: to go or come back to a person, place, or state
words.defineVi: để đi hoặc trở lại với một người, địa điểm, hoặc tiểu bang

examples: The general had to get his troops across the river.
Everyone has to pay their taxes.
Everyone has to make a living.
The old sofa will have to go.
We have to write a research paper for our college class.
words.defineEn: used to indicate an obligation or to emphasize the necessity of something happening
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để chỉ ra một nghĩa vụ hoặc để nhấn mạnh sự cần thiết của một cái gì đó xảy ra

examples: Their approach to sports teaching broke the mold.
The movie broke all box-office records.
The movie broke box office records in the US.
The bag broke under the weight of the bottles inside it.
My watch has broken.
words.defineEn: to become damaged and separated into pieces because of a blow, shock, etc.
words.defineVi: trở nên hư hỏng và tách thành từng mảnh do va đập, sốc, v.v.

words.defineEn: used when saying goodbye to someone, especially family and friends
words.defineVi: được sử dụng khi nói lời tạm biệt với ai đó, đặc biệt là gia đình và bạn bè

examples: Every day the crisis worsens and yet the government seems content to sit on its hands.
So the fatigue had worsened.
But, in India, the human disaster only worsens.
Also your stimulants can worsen your mania because it can speed you up even more.
That was worsened by the Great Kanto Earthquake of 1923.
words.defineEn: to become less desirable, easier, or tolerable
words.defineVi: để trở nên ít mong muốn hơn, dễ dàng hơn, hoặc chịu đựng được
